author: Vladimir Isachenkov / AP
title: Putin Orders Russians to Stop Working During April to Curb Coronavirus
description: President Vladimir Putin has ordered most Russians to stay off work until the end of the month to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
(MOSCOW) — President Vladimir Putin has ordered most Russians to stay off work until the end of the month to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
Speaking in a televised address to the nation on Thursday, Putin said he was extending the non-working policy he … [+1002 chars]
